params.holder: The address to claim JOE/AVAX for
The address to claim JOE/AVAX for
params.jTokens: The list of markets to claim JOE/AVAX in

params.borrowers: Whether or not to claim JOE/AVAX earned by borrowing
params.holders: The addresses to claim JOE/AVAX for
params.jTokens: The list of markets to claim JOE/AVAX in
params.suppliers: Whether or not to claim JOE/AVAX earned by supplying

grantReward(uint8,address,uint256).details: Note: If there is not enough JOE, we do not perform the transfer at all.

params.amount: The amount of JOE to (possibly) transfer
params.recipient: The address of the recipient to transfer JOE to

initialize().details: first call is made by the deploy script, the second one by joeTroller when calling `_setRewardDistributor`

initializeRewardAccrued(uint8,address[],.details: We initialize rewardAccrued to transfer pending rewards from previous rewarder to this one. Must call lockInitializeRewardAccrued() after initialization.

params.amounts: The list of amounts of unclaimed rewards
params.users: The list of addresses of users that did not claim their rewards

params.holder: The address to check pending JOE/AVAX for

pendingReward(uint8,address).return: pendingReward The pending JOE/AVAX reward of that holder

params.newAdmin: The address of the new admin

params.jToken: The market whose reward speed to update
params.rewardBorrowSpeed: New reward borrow speed for market
params.rewardSupplySpeed: New reward supply speed for market

params.jToken: The market to verify the mint against
params.marketBorrowIndex: Current index of the borrow market

params.jToken: The market to verify the mint against

claimReward(uint8,address).notice: Claim all the JOE/AVAX accrued by holder in all markets

claimReward(uint8,address,address[]).notice: Claim all the JOE/AVAX accrued by holder in the specified markets

claimReward(uint8,address[],address[],bo.notice: Claim all JOE/AVAX accrued by the holders

initialize().notice: Initialize function, in 2 times to avoid redeploying joetroller

initializeRewardAccrued(uint8,address[],.notice: Initialize rewardAccrued of users for the first time

pendingReward(uint8,address).notice: Returns the pending JOE/AVAX reward accrued by the holder

setRewardSpeed(uint8,address,uint256,uin.notice: Set JOE/AVAX speed for a single market

updateAndDistributeBorrowerRewardsForTok.notice: Refactored function to calc and rewards accounts borrower rewards

updateAndDistributeSupplierRewardsForTok.notice: Refactored function to calc and rewards accounts supplier rewards
